text: Geraldine is a female given name.The pronunciation of the name is [ jer-uhl- deen ]. It is a female version of the name Gerald. The name means "ruler of spear" .This is a unique name (not in the top 1000 newborn names in the US in 2021). There are many famous people having the name, such as Geraldine Ferraro, Geri Halliwell and Geraldine James. == People == * Geraldine Fitzgerald , Irish-American actress * Geraldine Chaplin, British-American actress * Geraldine McEwan, British actress (1932-2015) * Geraldine Farrar, American soprano opera singer and film actress (1882-1967) * Geraldine James, British actress ==References== Category:Given names
title: Geraldine
